snippet: Prosecutors called for the conviction and life imprisonment of Radovan Karadzic on 11 charges, including genocide, stemming from the 1992-95 war.
abstract: War crimes trial of Bosnian Serb leader Radovan Karadzic ends following four years of hearings and testimony; prosecutors call for the conviction and life imprisonment of Karadzic on 11 charges, including genocide, stemming from the 1992-95 war; Karadzic proclaims his innocence.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors called for the conviction and life imprisonment of Radovan Karadzic on 11 charges, including genocide, stemming from the 1992-95 war.

headline.main: Bosnian Serb Ex-Leader Closes His Defense at War Crimes Trial
headline.print_headline: Bosnian Serb Ex-Leader Closes His Defense at War Crimes Trial

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject

keywords.value: International Criminal Tribunal for the former Yugoslavia
